title: The Bypass Economy: How AI, Frictionless Payments, and Value-Seeking Consumers Are Rewriting the Rules
author: Hass Dhia
excerpt: Three forces are dismantling middlemen across industries: agentic browsers summarizing content, frictionless payments eliminating spending restraint, and consumers demanding substance over hype. The question isn't whether disintermediation accelerates - it's whether your brand is worth seeking out directly.
